sentences.en: Come on, tuck in, everybody!
sentences.cn: 来呀, 大家尽量吃吧!

sentences.en: He stole a Mars bar from the school tuck shop.
sentences.cn: 他从学校小吃店偷了一条玛氏巧克力棒。

sentences.en: He tried to tuck his flapping shirt inside his trousers.
sentences.cn: 他设法把飘起的衬衫塞到裤子里。

sentences.en: His photographic memory enabled him to tuck away yards of facts.
sentences.cn: 他过目不忘的记忆力使他能记下大量事实.

sentences.en: I tucked into the bacon and scrambled eggs.
sentences.cn: 我痛快地吃熏肉和炒鸡蛋。

sentences.en: My mother would tuck me in, turn out the lights and tiptoe out.
sentences.cn: 母亲会给我掖好被子，关上灯，然后蹑手蹑脚走出去。

sentences.en: Read a story to your kids and sing to them when you tuck them in at night.
sentences.cn: 打你夜晚抱起你的孩子哄他入睡的时候，给他讲个故事或是唱一首歌

sentences.en: savers are turning to unit trusts as the best place to tuck away their money.
sentences.cn: 储蓄者转求单位信托，视其为最好的存钱处。

sentences.en: She'd undergone 13 operations, including a tummy tuck.
sentences.cn: 她已经做了13次手术，包括一次腹部瘦身整形手术。

sentences.en: So Miss Ellen , she tuck an'nuss dem too.
sentences.cn: 这样,爱伦小姐就得同时护理她们了.

sentences.en: Stewart neatly tucked away the first goal.
sentences.cn: 斯图尔特利落地进了第一个球。

sentences.en: The dress was too big, so Mother put a tuck in it.
sentences.cn: 衣服太大, 所以妈妈在里面打了裥.

sentences.en: The extra income has meant Phillippa can tuck away the rent.
sentences.cn: 额外的收入意味着菲莉帕可以把房租的钱存起来。

sentences.en: The presidential contest is nip and tuck.
sentences.cn: 总统竞选势均力敌。

sentences.en: the school tuck shop
sentences.cn: 学校糖果食品店

sentences.en: The seamstresses cluck around a dummy, discussing a tuck here and there.
sentences.cn: 这些女裁缝围着模特儿衣架叽叽嘎嘎地讨论衣服这里或那里要做的小改动。

sentences.en: The shirt's ideal worn loose over leggings or tuck it in for a streamlined silhouette.
sentences.cn: 这件衬衫最好是松松垮垮地穿在紧身裤外面，或者是塞进裤子里以显出苗条的身材。

sentences.en: Tuck the sheets in firmly.
sentences.cn: 掖紧被子。

sentences.en: Tuck your shirt into your trousers.
sentences.cn: 把你的衬衫下摆掖进裤腰里.

sentences.en: Tuck's a flaming New Dealer but he's competent and tough.
sentences.cn: 塔克是个激烈拥护“新政”的人,但他是精明强干的硬汉子.

sentences.en: You tuck your secret away in an unexpected place, like an MP3 or a photo file, to conceal the fact you even shared any information at all.
sentences.cn: 你将你的秘密“卷起来”，放在一个意想不到的地方，比如MP3或照片文件，这样就掩盖了你曾经分享信息的事实。

words.tran_cn: 领布；打褶装置；打横褶的人
食物；船尾突出部；缝摺；抱膝式跳水；活力；鼓声
缝褶裥；缩拢；舒服地裹在里面；大口吃

phrases.tran_cn: 塔克修士（罗宾汉传说中的人物，是罗宾汉的牧师兼管家）
安置于（被窝里）：把（如，孩子）放进床里睡觉，尤指把铺盖塞进床里

trans.tran_cn: 鼓声，喇叭声，活力，精力，（袖子等上的）褶皱，卷起，盖住
trans.tran_en: a narrow flat fold of cloth sewn into a piece of clothing for decoration or to give it a special shape
to put a  tuck (= special fold )  in a piece of clothing

trans.tran_cn: <英俚>吃，喝，折叠（衣服的）褶，包起，裹起，挤进
trans.tran_en: to put a  tuck (= special fold )  in a piece of clothing
